scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:AnonymousContextualPanelShell_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
<script type="text/javascript">
if (window === window.top) {
	jQuery(function(j){
		var redirected = false;
		var ensureLoggedIn = function(){
			if (!redirected) {
				var hashData = jQuery.telligent.evolution.url.hashData();
				if (hashData._cptype){
					redirected = true;
					window.location = jQuery.telligent.evolution.url.modify({
						url:'$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_urls.Login())',
						query: {
							ReturnUrl:window.location+''
						},
						hash: ''
					});
				}
			}
		};
		jQuery(window).on('hashchange', function(){
			ensureLoggedIn();
		});
		ensureLoggedIn()
	});
}
</script>

language.resource: Handles login redirects when anonymous users attempt to access a contextual panel.
